entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. How can I assist you today?
I need to return something. I bought it a couple of weeks ago.
I can certainly help with that. Could you please provide me with the name of the product you wish to return?
It's the VeloBand Pulse. This smart watch isn’t working properly.
Okay, I understand. The VeloBand Pulse. And when approximately did you purchase it?
Maybe 15 days ago? Somewhere around there. It's important that I can do this return without hassle, so let me know what I need to do.
Thank you for that information. Our standard return policy is 90 days for most items. Let me quickly pull up your order to confirm the purchase date.
Okay, I have your order here. Yes, I see the VeloBand Pulse purchased 15 days ago. No problem at all. According to our return policy, you are well within the return window.
Okay, good. So what do I do now? I need to get this done quickly.

I can process a return for you right now. You'll receive a prepaid shipping label via email within the next hour. Just pack the VeloBand Pulse securely in its original packaging, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive the returned item, a full refund will be credited back to your original payment method.
That sounds easy enough. Will the refund include shipping costs?
Yes, the refund will include the original shipping costs as well. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, I think that's it. I really appreciate you sorting this out so quickly. I was worried there might be problems.
You're very welcome! We want to make the return process as smooth as possible. We value your business. Just remember to look out for that email with the shipping label. Have a wonderful day!
